commit.message:
re PR fortran/35584 (overzealous warning: branch causes infinite loop)

2008-03-15  Daniel Franke  <franke.daniel@gmail.com>

        PR fortran/35584
        * resolve.c (resolve_branch): Less strict and pessimistic warning
        message.

From-SVN: r133250
